title: Onyx Apartment
description:
Apartment Onyx combines modern design with the charm of Lovran’s peaceful surroundings. Situated next to Apartment Olive, it is only 10 minutes from the old town and the famous Lungomare promenade. With its private pool, sun-kissed terrace, and panoramic views of Kvarner Bay, Onyx offers plenty of space, natural light, and accommodation for up to 6 guests.
Perfect for couples, families, or business travelers, Onyx provides a relaxing yet modern atmosphere for your stay. Just 100 meters from the beach and featuring a private garden, BBQ area, and secure parking, it is a perfect choice for a relaxing stay or working remotely by the sea.
